definition.de: Menschen, die das Alter der juristischen Volljährigkeit erreicht haben
definition.dk: Personer, der har opnået en myndighedsalder på 18 år.
definition.en-GB: People above an age set by law that entitles them to full liability and certain privileges such as the legal right to drink alcoholic beverages and to vote
definition.en-US: People above an age set by law that entitles them to full liability and certain privileges such as the legal right to drink alcoholic beverages and to vote
definition.pt-BR: Pessoas acima da idade definida por lei para adquirir responsabilidade total.
definition.pt-PT: Pessoas acima da idade definida por lei para adquirir responsabilidade total.
definition.se: Personer som har uppnått myndighetsåldern, 18 år.
definition.zh-Hans: 达到法定成年年龄的承担全部责任的人
